name: FIXED ! - Poor Guy Saves the World
name_original: FIXED ! - Poor Guy Saves the World
description:
In a third World Country a President give The Power of people in your hands... Under  Demoniac influence, seeking The  System plans to Dominante ALL The Wolrd , Declares War for The population reduction.

You are a Angry And Poor guy with a gun in your hands to makes justice by yourself !

POOR GUY SAVES THE WORLD is a 2D SIDE SCROLLER SHOOTER GAME  made in two days for MS PAINT GAMEJAM . All engine code and Graphic stuff is created in this period.

The game Have Original SoundTrack Composed by Me, are made in few Hours.
